channel.title: CVE Feed for Softnext -- SN OS 12.1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Softnext -- SN OS 12.1

item.title: CVE-2024-5670|2024-07-31T18:12:20.483Z -- softnext -- sn%20os%2012.1
item.description: The web services of Softnext's products, Mail SQR Expert and Mail Archiving Expert do not properly validate user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary OS commands and execute them on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-5670|2024-07-29T02:23:20.658Z -- softnext -- sn%20os%2012.1
item.description: The web services of Softnext's products, Mail SQR Expert and Mail Archiving Expert do not properly validate user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary OS commands and execute them on the remote server.
